Students from England, Scotland and Wales

Start your adventure in Northern Ireland

University is a life-changing experience so where you study can often be as important as the course you choose. Wherever you’re from, studying at Ulster University in Northern Ireland is guaranteed to be an unforgettable experience.

Travel and accommodation

Travelling to Northern Ireland and moving to university accommodation.

Discounts

Three discount options are available to students from England, Scotland and Wales. Choose from packages including fees discount, or contribution towards travel or accommodation.

Find your undergraduate course at Ulster University.






Life and learning at Ulster University

Going to university is an exciting step and choosing where to study is an important decision that will shape your future. Ulster University is based in Northern Ireland, with four distinct campuses in Belfast, Coleraine, Jordanstown and Derry~Londonderry (Magee).


The student experience we offer is second to none.

From great teaching to first class resources and facilities, all within a supportive learning environment, you will receive a ‘uniquely Ulster’ experience that will help you to fulfil your potential.

  • Ulster in three words… Exciting, inspiring, unforgettable!

    Emer Smith - Renewable Energy (Student)

  • (My postgraduate course) has enabled me to make a career change at the age of 55! I am already reaping the benefits of having studied with Ulster University, having received a couple of temporary job offers abroad and I am confident that further opportunities will arise in the future.

    Susan Turner - Teaching of English to Speakers of Other Languages (TESOL)

  • At Ulster you will find a cosy place with modern infrastructure

    Luz Gomez - MSc Peace and Conflict Studies (Español) (Student)
